itemDisplayName: Deploy Drupal with VM Scale Set, Azure Files and Mysql
description: Deploy a VM Scale Set behind a load balancer/NAT & each VM running  Drupal (Apache / PHP). All nodes share the created Azure file share storage and MySQL database
summary: Deploy a VM Scale Set behind a load balancer/NAT & each VM running  Drupal (Apache / PHP). All nodes share the created Azure file share storage and MySQL database
